stats_menuTitle.title: Blocked Tracking Attempts
stats_menuTitle.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

stats_menuTitle_v2.title: Protection Stats
stats_menuTitle_v2.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

stats_noActivity.title: DuckDuckGo blocks tracking attempts as you browse. Visit a few sites to see how many we block!
stats_noActivity.note: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked trackers yet

stats_noRecent.title: Tracking protections active
stats_noRecent.note: Placeholder to indicate that no tracking activity was blocked in the last 7 days

stats_countBlockedSingular.title: Tracking attempt blocked
stats_countBlockedSingular.note: The main headline indicating that a single tracker was blocked

stats_countBlockedSingularLegacy.title: 1 tracking attempt blocked
stats_countBlockedSingularLegacy.note: The main headline indicating that a single tracker was blocked

stats_countBlockedPlural.title: Tracking attempts blocked
stats_countBlockedPlural.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

stats_countBlockedPluralLegacy.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
stats_countBlockedPluralLegacy.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

stats_noActivityAdsAndTrackers.title: DuckDuckGo blocks ads and tracking attempts as you browse. Visit a few sites to see how many we block!
stats_noActivityAdsAndTrackers.note: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked ads and trackers yet

stats_noRecentAdsAndTrackers.title: Protections active
stats_noRecentAdsAndTrackers.note: Placeholder to indicate that no ads or tracking activity was blocked in the last 7 days

stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersSingular.title: advertising & tracking attempt blocked
stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersSingular.note: The main headline indicating that a single ad or tracking attempt was blocked

stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersSingular.title: 1 advertising & tracking attempt blocked
stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersSingular.note: The main headline indicating that a single ad or tracking attempt was blocked

stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPlural.title: advertising & tracking attempts blocked
stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPlural.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 ad or tracking attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 advertising & tracking attempts blocked

stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPluralLe.title: {count} advertising & tracking attempts blocked
stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPluralLe.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 ad or tracking attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 advertising & tracking attempts blocked

stats_totalCookiePopUpsBlockedSingular.title: Cookie pop-up blocked
stats_totalCookiePopUpsBlockedSingular.note: The heading indicating that a single cookie pop-up was handled by the CPM

stats_totalCookiePopUpsBlockedPlural.title: Cookie pop-ups blocked
stats_totalCookiePopUpsBlockedPlural.note: The heading indicating multiple cookie pop-ups were handled by the CPM

stats_protectionsReportInfo.title: Displays tracking attempts blocked in the last 7 days and the number of cookie pop-ups blocked since you started using the browser. You can reset these stats using the Fire Button.
stats_protectionsReportInfo.note: Text explaining how to reset the protections stats

stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.title: 1 attempt blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 7 days
stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when only one exists.

stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.title: Past 7 days
stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.note: A summary description indicating the time period of the blocked tracking attempts, which is the past 7 days.

stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts were blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 7 days when there is more than one. E.g., '1,028 tracking attempts blocked.

stats_toggleLabel.title: Show recent activity
stats_toggleLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that shows the detailed activity feed

stats_hideLabel.title: Hide recent activity
stats_hideLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that hides the detailed activity feed

stats_otherCompanyName.title: Other
stats_otherCompanyName.note: A placeholder to represent an aggregated count of entries, not present in the rest of the list. For example, 'Other: 200', which would mean 200 entries excluding the ones already shown

stats_otherCount.title: {count} attempts from other networks
stats_otherCount.note: An aggregated count of blocked entries not present in the main list. For example, '200 attempts from other networks'
